features: Eye-friendly Desk Lamp: The cute desk lamp is 5 color modes, 3-level brightness. You may choose the favorite brightness you want for nail tech, reading, studying and working. Color temperature is 2800-6500K, eye caring soft light, non-flickering
Modern Design: The desk lamps for home office is in folding design with 180 degree adjustable head lamp and 90 degree rotatable base, portable to use anywhere, longer life
Sturdy Material: The table lamp takes up no place. Lamp body is aluminum and base is ABS. Enough strong to use in any indoor condition, no worry to break. It is a good desk lamps for bedrooms.
Extra Function: The desklamp comes with USB cable and power adapter. The USB charging port is 5V/1A to charge your smartphone
Warranty: The office desk light is 400 lumens. Input 110 Volts. Supply 12 months warranty

Aluminum material to assure sturdy lamp body 3-level brightness On/Off button is with 3-level brightness, touch control. 3 different brightness for your option 5 color modes CCT button is with 5 color modes for option. You may choose favorite light color for reading, working, relaxing or sleeping Extra function The desk lamp with USB charging port. You may use to charge smartphone or other USB devices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is pretty, I love the gold features. It is also lightweight & easy to use. The 3 light settings really come in handy. The only real complaint I have is that it only works when is plugged in. I thought there was a charging feature to it, but I guess not. Still would recommend getting it. It does the job well enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pretty desk lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this lamp! It’s lightweight but sturdy and offers me 3 different lighting options with multiple brightening settings (I like to use the warm lighting options for long hours of studying). I love the way this lamp looks in gold - it’s so cute in my space and is super compact. There is also a USB port which I use to recharge one of my devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern, trendy gold lamp... I love mine!
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp! It fits into small places and is so versatile. The light is bright and I love its ability to move to fit where I need the light. The price was amazing compared to retail stores I checked. I may buy another!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars review after 2 years of use
reviews.reviewText: I've used this lamp for two years now and wanted to leave a review.It has been reliable. It is very lightweight and doesn't take much space.The hinge allows you to direct the light to where you need it, but it is loose and collapses if you aren't careful. Because it is plastic there seems to be no way to tighten the hinge.The buttons to turn it on and change the color are easy enough but are not raised in any way so finding them in the dark involves a bit of flailing.The light colors seem to be institutional, bleak, alien blue and the fourth is a warmer shade. I always use the fourth setting. It has three levels of brightness.The "gold" color of the lamp itself is not actually gold but an odd bright brassy color. The entire lamp is plastic so I think of it as plastic brass.It was worth the low price.If you're looking for a task lamp I found one by Trond that is truly excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful great quality
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is a space saver, beautiful, works great, great quality, it has different lighting setting witch I love I would definitely recommend this lamp, got it for my granddaughter desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stops working after a couple of months
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to go in my office. it is very cute and I love the gold aesthetic however, it doesnt work anymore and I have had it less than 6 months. It would frequently turn off and now it doesnt turn on at all, even when it's plugged into the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp!!! You can change the colors from warm, bright, and blue lights! The usb on the back is perfect for charging my phone at work, and it is light weight! What a great buy at a great price!!!! A must have!!!
Me gustó mucho. Moderna, minimalists, tiene diferentes temperaturas de luz y diferentes intensidades.
